meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny! I'm back with another review that's sure to get you revving up (pun intended)!

So, Horizon Chase 2 - what can I say? It's like a shot of espresso for your gaming system. Fast-paced, high-energy, and oh-so-fun! Now, let me share my two cents (or should I say, two quarters?) with you.

First off, the track design is top-notch! It's like a beautifully crafted rollercoaster for your eyes to feast on. And don't even get me started on the sense of speed - it's like you're strapped into a real-life rocket ship! But, let's not forget about the competition; those critics I love to poke fun at (wink, wink) had some great things to say too!

Gaming Nexus thought it was "good" but "relatively mindless racing"... yawn. Push Square said it's "fun while it lasts," which is code for "not long enough." PlayStation Universe gave it a glowing review, calling it a "phenomenal package" and the "definitive arcade racing experience." GameSpew agreed, saying it's a "must-have" for fans of the genre. Even Impulsegamer joined in on the praise, saying it's a "template of what a sequel should be." And IGN Spain? Well, they just called it a "direct, beautiful, fun and simple racing arcade."

Now, I know what you're thinking - "What about PlayStation Country?" Ah, yes! They said it's not "deep or varied" but does deliver on the "high-speed racing fun." So, yeah... that's like me saying my favorite pizza is just okay, but still worth ordering.

All in all, Horizon Chase 2 is a blast to play - and I'm not just talking about the power-ups (although, let's be real, those are pretty cool too). It's an ode to classic arcade racing games with some modern twists to keep things fresh. So, if you're looking for a game that'll get your heart racing and your thumbs tapping, look no further!
